sknet.layerÂ¶

All the sknet.layer inherit from this base class. Its documentation presents all the details about thegeneral behaviors of the layers.

Layer Layer class used as parent of any implemented layer.

Input Output Layer

Input Input layer, first of any model.

Dense Layer

Dense Dense or fully connected layer.

Convolutional Layer

Conv2D 2D (spatial) convolutional layer.

Pool Layer

Pool Pooling layer over spatial and/or channel dimensions.
GlobalSpatialPool Pooling over all spatial dimension.

Special Layer

Activation Apply nonlinearity.
Spectrogram spectrogram layer (time-frequency representation of a time serie) This layer implement a spectrogram computation to allow to include it as part of a model when dealing with time serie data, it is also crucial to allow backpropagation through it in case some previous operation prior to this layer must be differentiated w.r.t.
LambdaFunction Apply a lambda function onto the input

Perturb Layer

Dropout Randomly mask values of the input
Gaussian Applies an additive or multiplicative Gaussian noise to the input
Uniform Applies an additive or multiplicative Uniform noise to the input
RandomCrop Random cropping of input images.
RandomRot90 randomly rotate by 90 degrees the input
RandomAxisReverse randomly reverse axis of the input

Shape Layer

Reshape reshape of the input accoridng to a given shape.
Stack stack multiple inputs into one.
Concat concatenate multiple inputs into one according to a given axis.
ExpandDim add an extra dimension in the input.
Merge merge multiple inputs into one according to some function.
